summary: Better trading is a mod which enhances the trading aspect of Skyrim. It gives merchants a boost, plus adds in some NPCs to sell firewood, a much needed addition to the game.
descriptionHtml:
[i]Note: All the screenshots were taken in both different versions of the mod and different leveled characters[/i][center][color=#c6c6c6]
[youtube]7wGutgb-koQ[/youtube]
Thank you to [url=http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=zocko1017]Pfc. J. Zocko [47th AB] RET[/url] for the video!
[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/ovTk5tE.png[/img]

[heading][u] Features [/u][/heading]
[list]
[*] Merchant's gold is significantly increased (so players are able to sell their items)
[*] Merchants stock is increased (so players have a wider range of items to choose from)
[*] Merchants stock for high-level players is improved (so high-level players still benefit from shopping)
[*] Major cities now have lumberjacks (so players can buy firewood quickly without having to chop it themselves)
[/list]

[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/mVhXGCo.png[/img]

All this mod requires in an up-to-date version of Skyrim. No DLC or other mods are necessary. Also, this mod has been tested with over 250 other mods, and no compatibility issues have been found, even alongside huge trading overhauls.

[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/Gt0CrhW.png[/img]

[heading][u] Nexus Mod Manager [/u][/heading]

Click 'Install With Manager' and NMM will automatically install it for you.

[heading][u] Steam [/u][/heading]

Click subscribe, and the mod will automatically subscribe. To update, open the game launcher and Steam will do it automatically for you.

[heading][u] Manual [/u][/heading]

Download the ZIP file, and extract it into [i]C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data[/i], or wherever your Data folder may be. To update, repeat the process.

[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/RzQO4GA.png[/img]

[heading][u] Nexus Mod Manager [/u][/heading]

In NMM, click uninstall, and it will be automatically removed from your system.

[heading][u] Steam [/u][/heading]

Click unsubscribe, and the mod will automatically stop loading.
[i]Note: It won't actually delete the mod data.[/i]

[heading][u] Manual [/u][/heading]

Navigate to [i]C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data[/i], or again, wherever your Data folder may be, and delete bettertrading.esp, then go to Meshes/Actors/Character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom/ and delete the bettertrading folder.

[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/LEIkb3M.png[/img]

[heading]V2.2[/heading]
+ Added some lumberjack-based dialogue to randomly appear
* Fixed the bug which caused the the new NPC's to randomly travel to Dragonsreach
* Fixed the bug which caused the the new NPC's to follow the player
* Changed a few NPCs around to give them a more unique feel

[heading]V2.1[/heading]
+ Skyrim Nexus support
* Fixed the dark face bug

[heading]V2.0[/heading]
- Lumberjack character
+ 9 Completely new lumberjacks, each unique, which appear around the 9 hold capitals
+ Firewood cap (which changes depending on the players level) which prevents the player from buying out more than one lumberjack at a time
* Improved the shop scaling system
* Added rarer items into shop at high levels
* Changed firewood stock for lumberjacks so it scales alongside the player

[heading]V1.0[/heading]
+ Lumberjack in Whiterun (who buys and sells firewood)
* Vendors now have more gold
* Firewood is now purchaseable
* Ebony arrows are now purchaseable
* Alchemists now sell more potions

[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/XZw1Ejk.png[/img]

Please check out some of my other mods on the nexus, or look at my workshop files on [url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198042065094/myworkshopfiles/?appid=72850]Steam[/url]:
[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55938/]Rise of an Emperor[/url][b] NEW! [/b]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55859/]Larcenist's Lair[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23543/]Realistic Race Armours[/url]
[/list]
[/color][/center]
